history.narrative: Law 5-77 was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 5-327, which was referred to the Committee on Government Operations. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on January 31, 1984 and February 14, 1984, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on March 1, 1984, it was assigned Act No. 5-113 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
